nodes.text: The Kallidah system was a star system that contained Kallidah, the homeworld of the Kallidahin species.

The Kallidah system was established in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, a series of articles on StarWars.com published in the wake of the release of the Star Wars Legends reference book The Essential Atlas by its authors Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. It was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in the Databank entry for the Kallidahin species that was published on StarWars.com.
